headline: GOP’s energy promises face limits in Pa. governor’s race
sentences:
HARRISBURG (AP) — Republican Bill Mc- Swain pledges to be a pro-energy governor by “turning on the spigot of natural gas.” Another hopeful, Dave White, says he wants Pennsylvania “to be the energy capital of the world.” A third candidate, Lou Barletta, says having a glut of natural gas in the ground without a pipeline is “like being in college […]
